info.name: STAR TREK - LEONARD MCCOY [TUMBLR]
info.description: Tired with the lack of Trek backgrounds, I decided to make one.
info.additionalInfo:
This coding might go over to other sites. If you use Google Chrome and/or Stylish, click Stylish, click [EDIT] beneath the script's name and set the "APPLIES TO" section to "URLs starting with", and type in "http://www.tumblr.com/"

If you have any questions (hopefully I can help), here's my Tumblr: http://devils-trap.tumblr.com
